updated_steps.goal: Inform the user that no relevant news articles about Samsung Electronics could be found due to search tool limitations and post it to the Slack channel 'agentic'.
updated_steps.deliverable: Slack message informing the user about the search tool limitations.

agent_meta.name: MainAgent
agent_meta.description: Coordinator for planning, replanning, and cross-agent handoff execution.
agent_meta.instruction_preview: You are the coordinator of a multi-agent system. Understand the user request, create practical execution steps, and orchestrate specialist agents for best quality.
